message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think you'll really love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $15000?
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate your generosity. However, I am only able to pay up to $10000 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement.

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I understand you're looking to get a good deal, but I have to make a living. I'm willing to meet you halfway. Would you be willing to pay $13000 for the product?

Thank you for your offer, Alice. While I understand your position, I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am still interested in purchasing the product, but at a price of $12000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
